name: fsas-onpremapi
description: On Player API to activate on prem IoT devices

scripts.copy: rsync -rv Dockerfile.amd64 package*.json deploy && mv dist deploy/
scripts.pre-deploy: rm -Rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel src --out-dir dist -s && rm -Rf deploy && mkdir -p deploy/dist && npm run -s copy
